channel.title: Making you start with 10 HP?
channel.description:
I'm using a Phonescape source, and my characters seem to start with 99 HP, no matter what I change it to. If I set my character's HP to 10 with about 1000 XP, it sets it straight back to 99 with 14m xp when I log in.
The only source I've seen with 10 HP is maybe Satan's Isle. Can anyone help me with making you start with just 10 HP? I'm okay about training it.
Thanks :)

item.title: Making you start with 10 HP?
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3

The only source I’ve seen with 10 HP is maybe Satan’s Isle. Can anyone help me with making you start with just 10 HP? I’m okay about training it.
